mapper.sql: id, name, password, email, sex, active, dept, level, salary
mapper.insert: insert into teacher (User_ID, Dept_ID, level, salary) values(#{id}, #{dept}, #{level}, #{salary})
mapper.select: SELECT course.Course_ID as "courseID", department.name as "dept", course.name as "courseName", course.description as "courseDescription", course.credit as "credit", classes.Class_ID as "classID", classes.year as "year", classes.term as "term", classes.maxSize as "maxSize", classes.size as "size" FROM course, classes, department, teach WHERE classes.Course_ID=course.Course_ID AND course.Dept_ID=department.Dept_ID AND teach.Class_ID=classes.Class_ID AND teach.User_ID=#{id};
